languages.text: {n}Маражай моргает — и на его лицо волной возвращается привычное вам выражение самодовольной надменности. Его рука сползает вам на горло, пальцы нащупывают клеймо.{/n} "Неужели, мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}? Если ты и дальше позволишь себе так говорить со мной, я буду вынужден придумывать тебе все новые и новые наказания..."

{n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай моргает — и на его лицо волной возвращается привычное вам выражение самодовольной надменности. Его рука сползает вам на горло, пальцы нащупывают клеймо.{/n} "Неужели, мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}? Если ты и дальше позволишь себе так говорить со мной, я буду вынужден придумывать тебе все новые и новые наказания..."

If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眨了眨眼，脸上重新浮现出你熟悉的傲慢神色。他的手掌抚过你的脖子，用手指描画着上面的烙印。{/n}“是吗，我的小宠物？如果你再用这种口气和我说话，我就不得不开发出更多新花样来惩罚你了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眨了眨眼，脸上重新浮现出你熟悉的卑微神色。他的手掌抚过你的脖子，用手指描画着上面的烙印。{/n}“是吗，我的小宠物？如果你再用这种口气和我说话，我就不得不开发出更多新花样来惩罚你了……”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pestañea, y su expresión adopta de nuevo el desdén arrogante que acostumbras a ver en ella. Te pasa la mano por el cuello, recorriendo tu marca con los dedos.{/n} «¿Conque esas tenemos, mascota mía? Como sigas hablándome de ese modo, me veré obligado a inventar nuevos castigos para ti...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pestañea, y su expresión adopta de nuevo el desdén arrogante que acostumbras a ver en ella. Te pasa la mano por el cuello, recorriendo tu marca con los dedos.{/n} «¿Conque esas tenemos, mascota mía? Como sigas hablándome de ese modo, me veré obligado a inventar nuevos castigos para ti...».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai cligne des yeux et semble retrouver l'attitude arrogante qui vous est désormais si familière. Sa main glisse sur votre gorge, un doigt effleurant le contour de votre marque.{/n} « Vraiment, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave ? Si vous continuez à vous comporter ainsi, je me trouverai contraint et forcé d'inventer de nouvelles manières de vous châtier... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

traits.locale_text: Marazhai cligne des yeux et semble retrouver l'attitude arrogante qui vous est désormais si familière. Sa main glisse sur votre gorge, un doigt effleurant le contour de votre marque.{/n} « Vraiment, {mf|mon brave petit|ma brave petite} esclave ? Si vous continuez à vous comporter ainsi, je me trouverai contraint et forcé d'inventer de nouvelles manières de vous châtier... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blinzelt und seine gewohnte selbstzufriedene Arroganz kehrt ins Gesicht zurück. Seine Hand gleitet an deinem Hals herunter und er zeichnet mit seinen Fingern das Brandmal nach.{/n} "Was Ihr nicht sagt, {mf|mein gehorsamer Ergebener|meine gehorsame Ergebene}? Wenn Ihr weiter so mit mir sprecht, werde ich gezwungen sein, mir immer mehr Bestrafungen für Euch auszudenken ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

Wenn Ihr weiter so mit mir sprecht, werde ich gezwungen sein, mir immer mehr Bestrafungen für Euch auszudenken ..."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが瞬きをする。次の瞬間には、あなたが見慣れた独りよがりの傲慢さをたたえた表情に戻っていた。彼の手があなたの喉の下に滑り込み、指が烙印をなぞる。{/n}「まだやるか、俺様の可愛いペット？もしお前がそんなふうに俺に話し続けるってなら、俺はお前にもっともっと多くの罰を考案せざるを得なくなるだろうな…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kırpıyor. Ardından yüzünde görmeye aşina olduğun o ukala kibir, tekrar yerini alıyor. Eli boğazına doğru kayıyor. Parmakları, damganın üzerinde geziniyor.{/n} "Öyle mi minik evcil hayvanım? Benimle böyle konuşmaya devam edersen senin için daha pek çok ceza bulmak zorunda kalacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the smug arrogance you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. His hand slips down your throat, his fingers tracing the brand.{/n} "Is that so, my little pet? If you keep speaking to me like this, I will be forced to invent more and more punishments for you..."

Parmakları, damganın üzerinde geziniyor.{/n} "Öyle mi minik evcil hayvanım? Benimle böyle konuşmaya devam edersen senin için daha pek çok ceza bulmak zorunda kalacağım."
